title: Emily Osment
summary: Emily Jordan Osment (born March 10, 1992)[1] is an American actress, singer, and songwriter. Born and raised in Los Angeles, Osment began her career as a child actress, appearing in numerous television shows and films before co-starring as Gerti Giggles in Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams (2002) and Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over (2003). She went on to play the role of Lilly Truscott in the Disney Channel television series Hannah Montana (2006â€“2011) and appeared in the theatrical film based on the series, Hannah Montana: The Movie (2009).[2]
